item.description:
It's been a really rough week for runners.  Heck, it's been rough for everybody.  Tuesday night, let's reconnect, blow off steam, mourn, celebrate, feel gratitude, run with our tribe, or all of the above and more:  LET'S TAKE OUR TOWNS BACK!  All day Friday in lockdown we couldn't run in Waltham or Watertown.  And I really needed a run on Friday--I bet you felt it too.  So let's make this a special run and celebrate the places we love to run TOGETHER!

If you've got it, wear royal blue or yellow--the colors of the 2013 Boston Marathon, for the runners.  I'll try to bring some colors to share too.

Let's go for a run along the Waltham Bike Path. We'll meet at the Skellig.  6 mile option to Watertown Square or 4 mile loop to Bridge Street and back.
item.name: Tuesday Evening Run - 5 - 6 miles - Range of paces (7 - 11 min miles)
